title: 崩溃求助
author: NES-Eden
txt_content:

  JustEnoughIDs Extension Plugin (JustEnoughIDs-1.0.3-48.jar)
  LoadingPlugin (RandomThings-MC1.12.2-4.2.7.3.jar)
  Do not report to Forge! (If you haven't disabled the FoamFix coremod, try disabling it in the config! Note that this bit of text will still appear.) (foamfix-0.10.10-1.12.2.jar)
  AdvancedRocketryPlugin (AdvancedRocketry-1.12.2-1.6.0-196-universal.jar)
  Mal**CorePlugin (mal**core-1.12.2-6.5.1.jar)
  Inventory Tweaks Coremod (InventoryTweaks-1.64+dev.150.jar)
  IvToolkit (IvToolkit-1.3.3-1.12.jar)
Contact their authors BEFORE contacting forge

Description: Initializing game

replies.author: 阴阳师元素祭祀
replies.txt_content: 更新显卡驱动如果没用就试试回退

replies.author: 结城希亚
replies.txt_content: 更新你的显卡驱动到最新

replies.author: DJCM
replies.txt_content: 显卡驱动不行在网上找一个安装驱动的软件如驱动大师等
